CustomField.description: If you want Copado to update the status to Failed if there is no response from the function’s job after a certain period of time (e.g., 60 minutes), you can define it here.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If you want Copado to update the status to Failed if there is no response from the function’s job after a certain period of time (e.g., 60 minutes), you can define it here.
CustomField.label: Timeout (minutes)
